meanings.sent1: The subaxial vertebrae are located beneath the main axis of the spine.
meanings.sent2: The subaxial region of the map is highlighted in blue.
meanings.sent3: The tiny submarine dove to the subaxial depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts delved into the subaxial realm of dreams.
meanings.sent5: The subaxial position of the sun cast long shadows across the valley.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the lower part of the neck.
meanings.sent1: The subaxial muscles support the lower neck area during movement.
meanings.sent2: She felt a slight pain in her subaxial region after sleeping in an awkward position.
meanings.sent3: The subaxial scarf kept her neck warm on the chilly evening.
meanings.sent4: His subaxial tattoo peeked out from under the collar of his shirt.
meanings.sent5: The subaxial collar of the dress added a touch of elegance to her outfit.
